Protocol.HubTooBusy: The hub is currently too busy... try again later.
Protocol.ReadBufferFull: The message you've sent is too long, max length allowed is: %d bytes
Protocol.IncorrectProtocolMessage: Your direct connect client has sent an invalid protocol message
Protocol.ValidateNickToShort: Your nickname is too short, please change it and reconnect
Protocol.ValidateNickToLong: Your nickname is too long, please shorten it and reconnect
Protocol.ValidateMyINFOToLong: The MyINFO line supplied by your client is longer than allowed, shorten your description or change client
Protocol.InvalidKeySuppliedByClient: Your direct connect client has supplied an invalid key
Protocol.InvalidMyINFOSuppliedByClient: Your direct connect client has supplied an invalid MyINFO
Protocol.InvalidPMSuppliedByClient: Your direct connect client has supplied an invalid TO
Protocol.InvalidSRSuppliedByClient: Your direct connect client has supplied an invalid SR
Protocol.InvalidIPOnSearchOrConnectToMe: Your direct connect client has supplied an invalid IP address in a connection request (client sent %s, you have %s). This is usually a client configuration problem
Protocol.InvalidRevConnectToMe: Your direct connect client has supplied an invalid RevConnectToMe
Protocol.InvalidIPPatternOnAccount: Your IP address doesn't match the required IP/IP range for this nickname, try changing nickname and reconnect!
Protocol.NickInUse: The nickname you've supplied is already in use by another user, please change it and reconnect
Protocol.NickReservedForHubPinger: The nickname you've supplied is reservered, please change it and reconnect
Protocol.NickRegisteredProvidePass: Your nickname is registered, please provide a password
Protocol.IncorrectPasswordAutoBan: You've been banned for supplying an incorrect password too many times
Protocol.IncorrectNickInMainChat: Your client has supplied an incorrect nickname when posting to mainchat
Protocol.MainChatLocked: Mainchat is currently locked, maybe it's time to listen?
Protocol.ConnectToMeDisabled: Downloading from other users in active mode is currently disabled
Protocol.RevConnectToMeDisabled: Downloading from other users in passive mode is currently disabled
Protocol.RevConnectToMeResponseDisabled: The user you are trying to download from is not allowed to respond to your clients passive connection request. Try using active mode instead
Protocol.SearchTooLong: The search you've entered is longer than the maximum allowed length
Protocol.PassiveSearchNotAllowed: Searching in passive mode is currently disabled
Protocol.ToShortPassiveSearch: Your search is too short, please be more specific
Protocol.SpamAbuseKickSearch: You've been kicked for search spam abuse
Protocol.SpamAbuseKickMainChat: You've been kicked for mainchat spam abuse
Protocol.SpamAbuseKickMyINFO: You've been kicked for MyINFO spam abuse
Protocol.SpamAbuseKickNickList: You've been kicked for refresh nicklist spam abuse
Protocol.SpamAbuseKickPM: You've been kicked for private message spam abuse
Protocol.SpamAbuseKickJunkData: You've been kicked for junk data spam abuse
Protocol.CutDueToLengthMessage: This message was cut due to length
Protocol.MutedUserMessage: You're currently muted and unable to speak
Protocol.ConnectionTimeout: You've been disconnected because the negotiation between your client and the hub took too long
Protocol.InCorrectISPPattern: Your name should have (one of) the following prefix(s): %s
Protocol.TooBusyToRefreshNickList: The connection between you and the hub is too busy to refresh nicklist at this moment
Protocol.OnKickUserNotFound: The user you're trying to kick couldn't be found
Protocol.OnKickUserUnKickable: This user is protected by Lord Yoshi himself, trust me you do NOT wanna do this
Protocol.OnKickUserTooLowAccountLvl: This user is too powerful for a safe victory
Protocol.OnKickUserWithReason: %s, IP address: %s was kicked by %s because: %s
Protocol.OnKickUserWithTotalKicks: %s, IP address: %s was kicked (total kicks: %d) by %s
Protocol.OnKickUserWithTotalKicksAndReason: %s, IP address: %s was kicked (total kicks: %d) by %s because: %s
Protocol.OnKickUserWithTotalKicksAndAutoBan: %s, IP address: %s was kicked (total kicks: %d thus auto banned) by %s
Protocol.OnKickUserWithTotalKicksAndReasonAndAuto: %s, IP address: %s was kicked (total kicks: %d thus auto banned) by %s because: %s
Protocol.OnKickIfKennylized: Oh my god, %s! You killed kenny. You bastard
Protocol.OnRedirectUserNotFound: The user you're trying to redirect couldn't be found
Protocol.OnRedirectUserUnMoveable: This user is protected by Lord Yoshi himself, trust me you do NOT wanna do this
Protocol.OnRedirectUserTooLowAccountLvl: This user is too powerful for a safe victory
Protocol.OnNewProfile: Your account profile have been changed from %s to %s
Protocol.OnInvalidMcToFeedMessage: %s tried to send an invalid MCTo message: %s
Protocol.HubIsFull: The hub is currently full, try connecting again later
Protocol.RegisteredUsersOnly: This is a registered users only hub
Protocol.InCorrectISP: Your ISP/IP isn't allowed on this hub, allowed ISPs are: %s
Protocol.LowShare: You're not sharing enough, your sharesize is %s and the minimum allowed is %s
Protocol.HighShare: You're sharing too much, your sharesize is %s and the maximum allowed is %s
Protocol.NoTag: Your client didn't supply a description tag, currently this isn't allowed
Protocol.NoPassive: You've connected in passive mode, currently this isn't allowed
Protocol.NoPassiveWhileConnected: Your client has performed a passive action which currently isn't allowed
Protocol.HighHubs: You're currently connected to too many hubs, you're on %d hubs and the current limit is: %d
Protocol.LowSlots: You havn't got enough slots open, you've got %d and the minimum allowed is: %d
Protocol.HighSlots: You've got too many slots open, you've got %d and the maximum allowed is: %d
Protocol.LowSlotsRatio: Your slot ratio is currently too low, your ratio is %s slots/hub and the minimum allowed is: %d slots/hub
Protocol.IncorrectPasswordNotification: The IP %s has entered the incorrect password for %s %d times

HubRegistration.ResolvingIPFailed: The attemp to resolve the IP address failed, the hostname may be invalid
HubRegistration.ConnectionTimeOut: Timed out without receiving appropriate reply from host
HubRegistration.ConnectionClosedByForeignHost: The connection was closed by the host before registration was completed
HubRegistration.SendFailed: Failed while trying to send hubinfo to host
HubRegistration.SendSuccessful: Key and hubinfo successfully sent to host

BanList.NewBanWithTime: You've been temporary banned until %s by %s
BanList.NewBanWithTimeAndReason: You've been temporary banned until %s by %s because: %s
BanList.ExistingBan: You're banned from this hub by %s
BanList.ExistingBanWithReason: You're banned from this hub by %s because: %s
BanList.ExistingBanWithTimeAndReason: You're temporary banned until %s by %s because: %s
BanList.ExistingClientBan: Your client is banned from this hub by %s
BanList.ExistingClientBanWithReason: Your client is banned from this hub by %s because: %s
BanList.ExistingClientBanWithTime: Your client is temporary banned until %s by %s
BanList.ExistingClientBanWithTimeAndReason: Your client is temporary banned until %s by %s because: %s
BanList.TmpBanIP: The IP address %s is still banned for another %s as %s
BanList.TmpBanIPWithReason: The IP address %s is still banned for another %s as %s because: %s
BanList.TmpBanNick: You are still temporarily banned for another %s (Hammering will keep resetting your ban)
BanList.TmpBanNickWithReason: You are still temporarily banned for another %s (Hammering will keep resetting your ban) because: %s
BanList.TmpBanRemoveNoneFound: There were no temporary bans that needed to be removed
BanList.ShareTraceNoUpdate: You've been requested to update your share but you still haven't
BanList.ShareTraceNoUpdateReason: You've been kicked because: %s and still haven't corrected your share
BanList.ShareTraceNotifyShareUpdateMessage: %s (IP: %s) has updated the share and was granted access

ChatRooms.CreateChatRoomErrorNoNick: Could not create chatroom: Name of chatroom missing!
ChatRooms.CreateChatRoomErrorToLongNick: Could not create chatroom: Name of chatroom must be less than 32 characters!
ChatRooms.CreateChatRoomErrorNickInUse: Could not create chatroom: The nickname is already in use by another user or chatroom!
ChatRooms.CommandHelpList: %s <search> <offset> - List of users currently in the chatroom (search and offset parameters are optional. Ex: +list yos* 20)
ChatRooms.CommandHelpJoin: %s - Adds you as a user of the chatroom (only if public)
ChatRooms.CommandHelpLeave: %s - Removes you as a user of the chatroom
ChatRooms.CommandListNoUserFound: No users where found matching the pattern: %s
ChatRooms.CommandListHeader: Showing %d hits from offset %d, total hits: %d
ChatRooms.CommandJoinNewUser: Welcome %s to this chatroom, write %s to recieve a list of available commands
ChatRooms.CommandLeave: Bye %s, hope to see you soon!
ChatRooms.CommandInviteNickMissing: You have to supply a nick of a user connected to the hub
ChatRooms.CommandInviteNonUser: Haha, you mortal fool... %s hardly needs your invitation to enter this chatroom
ChatRooms.CommandInviteAlreadyInvited: %s is already a part of this chatroom and can't be invited again
ChatRooms.CommandInviteTellTheUser: You've been invited by %s, send +help to list available commands
ChatRooms.CommandKickNickMissing: You have to supply a nick of a user you wish to kick from this chatroom
ChatRooms.CommandKickNickNotFound: The nick you supplied is not a user in this chatroom, use +list command to show users
ChatRooms.CommandKickNotPossible: This user is too powerful for a safe victory
ChatRooms.NonCommandOfNotJoinedUser: This is a chatroom, type +h for help

HubBot.ForbiddenCommand: You don't have access to this command
HubBot.ErrorCommand: Wrong number of parameters. Type $help for help
HubBot.ListHeader: Showing %d hits from offset %d, total hits: %d
HubBot.HelpHeader: These commands are available to you:
HubBot.HelpLock: Sets lock on hub. When activated (on) hub appears offline
HubBot.HelpTopic: Sets a hubtopic (no topic deletes current topic)
HubBot.HelpSaveAllSettings: Saves all YnHub settings to disk
HubBot.HelpSetRedirects: Sets a redirect, omit type and addr parameter to get available types
HubBot.HelpMaxUsers: Set max amount of users allowed in the hub
HubBot.HelpSetMinShare: Sets hub min share (sufix: KiB, MiB, GiB, TiB, PiB)
HubBot.HelpSetMaxShare: Sets hub max share (ex. 50 GiB, 0 = disabled)
HubBot.HelpDisableMainChat: Disable the ablity to post in main chat (overriden by operators and specially allowed users)
HubBot.HelpAllowMC: Allow user to override when mainchat is disabled
HubBot.HelpDisallowMC: Removes the privilege to override when mainchat is disabled
HubBot.HelpUserInfo: Information on one or more users
HubBot.HelpIPInfo: Information on one or more ips
HubBot.HelpNickInfo: Nick information from an IP/IP range
HubBot.HelpTrafficStats: Display traffic statistics (Types: Search, SR, Connect, NickList, MyINFO, MC, PM, Data, BW)
HubBot.HelpCoreInfo: Display more detailed information about the hub core
HubBot.HelpAccountDel: Delete an account (note: does not kick user if online)
HubBot.HelpAccountChange: Change nick/pass of an account (note: requires both addreg and delreg access. Password is optional)
HubBot.HelpAccountList: Shows accounts, use "all" as profile to list regardless of profile
HubBot.HelpAccountSetProfile: Sets the profile of an account
HubBot.HelpAccountSetIPs: Sets one or more IP/IP range(s) for the account, use ; as delimiter
HubBot.HelpAccountShowIPs: Shows the required IP/IP range(s) for the account
HubBot.HelpAccountSetComment: Sets a comment to the account
HubBot.HelpAccountSetGreeting: Sets a greeting to the account
HubBot.HelpAccountSetExpireDate: Sets an expire date on an account (Ex. "%s", "0" for permanent)
HubBot.HelpAccountSetOwner: Sets an owner on an account (if no owner is supplied you become owner)
HubBot.HelpBlockUser: Block user (user will become unable to search and download)
HubBot.HelpKickUser: Kicks a user and adds to tempban
HubBot.HelpBanUser: Bans a user by IP (User kicked)
HubBot.HelpBanNick: Bans a nick or pattern (Ex. *demo*, may be left/right/both truncated)
HubBot.HelpBanIP: Bans a IP or IP range (Ex. 127.0.*)
HubBot.HelpBanDNS: Bans a DNS or DNS pattern (Ex. *.anydns.com, use ? as any char)
HubBot.HelpBanClient: Bans a client or client pattern (Ex. DC++0.1*)
HubBot.HelpTBanUser: Bans a user by IP for <time> hours (User kicked)
HubBot.HelpTBanNick: Bans a nick or pattern for <time> hours
HubBot.HelpTBanIP: Bans an IP or IP range for <time> hours
HubBot.HelpTBanDNS: Bans a DNS or DNS pattern for <time> hours
HubBot.HelpUnBan: Unbans a user banned by Nick/IP/DNS
HubBot.HelpUnBanClient: Unbans a client or client pattern
HubBot.HelpClearTempBans: Clears <limit> temporary bans Ex. limit = 1: clears last tempban
HubBot.HelpISPShowISPs: Shows all isps or specified ISP (for more detailed information)
HubBot.HelpISPSearchISPs: Searches among IPs showing matching ISPs
HubBot.HelpISPMatchISP: Looks for an ISP matching the <ip>
HubBot.HelpISPSetMinShare: Set min share for ISP (sufix: KiB, MiB, GiB, TiB, PiB)
HubBot.HelpISPSetMaxShare: Set max share for ISP (ex. 50 GiB, 0 = disabled)
HubBot.HelpISPSetMaxHubs: Set max hubs for ISP (0 = disabled)
HubBot.HelpISPSetMinSlots: Set min slots for ISP (0 = disabled)
HubBot.HelpISPSetMaxSlots: Set max slots for ISP (0 = disabled)
HubBot.HelpISPSetSlotRatio: Set slotratio for iSP (min slots / hub, 0 = disabled)
HubBot.HelpISPShowIPsOnISP: Shows all approved IP/IP ranges for <isp>
HubBot.HelpMute: Mutes user (Unable to post in mainchat, use * to mute all)
HubBot.HelpUnMute: Unmutes user (able to post in mainchat again, use * to unmute all)
HubBot.HelpKennylize: Kennylizes user (Posts in mainchat will be affected, use * to kennylize all)
HubBot.HelpLunarize: Lunarizes user (makes user talk funny, use * to lunarize all)
HubBot.HelpSay: Says <message> in mainchat as if <nick> said it
HubBot.HelpMC: Sends <message> in mainchat from me (the hub bot)
HubBot.HelpInform: Sends <message> as a private message to <user> from me (the hub bot)
HubBot.HelpPM: Sends a PM from me (the hub bot) to everyone
HubBot.HelpPMProfile: Sends a PM from me (the hub bot) to everyone with profile <profile>
HubBot.HelpOPM: Sends a PM from me (the hub bot) to all operators
HubBot.HelpHideShare: Toggle hide share (when hidden showing zero bytes plus no search/connect to you)
HubBot.HelpHideMe: Remove yourself from nicklist while still being able to stay online
HubBot.HelpSetTextCommand: Changes the content of a text command
HubBot.HelpShowTextCommand: Shows the content of a text command
HubBot.TrafficInfoTooLowProfileLevel: You're not allowed to view traffic info on %s
HubBot.TrafficStatsSearchInvalidParameter: The type you've supplied isn't a recognized typ. Valid types are: Search, SR, Connect, NickList, MyINFO, MC, PM, Data, BW
HubBot.AccountProfileDontExists: Profile does not exist, type %s to list profiles
HubBot.AccountAdd: Registered the account %s of profile %s with password %s @ %s
HubBot.AccountAddProfileAccessError: You're not allowed to add an account of this profile
HubBot.AccountDelProfileAccessError: You don't have permission to delete this account
HubBot.AccountChangeProfileAccessError: You don't have permission to rename this account

HubBot.AccountChangeNick: The account %s has been changed to %s
HubBot.AccountChangePass: The password of %s has been updated to %s
HubBot.AccountListProfileDontExists: Profile does not exist, specify all or type %s to list profiles
HubBot.AccountSetProfileProfileNotFound: The profile %s wasn't found, write $showprofiles (sp) to list available profiles
HubBot.AccountSetProfileAccountAccessError: You're not allowed to modify this account
HubBot.AccountSetProfileAccessError: You're not allowed to use this profile
HubBot.AccountSetProfileSuccess: The profile of %s has been updated to %s
HubBot.AccountSetProfileFeedMessage: %s has updated the profile of %s to %s

HubBot.AccountSetCommentSuccess: The comment of %s has been updated to: %s

HubBot.AccountSetGreetingSuccess: The greeting of %s has been updated to: %s
HubBot.AccountSetExpireProfileAccessError: You're not allowed to modify expire date of an account of this profile
HubBot.AccountSetExpireIncorrectDate: The date you've supplied is not in a correct date format (Ex. %s or 0 for none)

HubBot.AccountSetExpireSuccess: The expire date of %s has been updated to: %s
HubBot.AccountSetExpireDelSuccess: The expire date of %s has been removed
HubBot.AccountSetIpsProfileAccessError: You're not allowed to modify required IP/IP pattern on an account of this profile

HubBot.AccountSetPassSuccess: Password of %s has been updated to: %s
HubBot.AccountShowPassProfileAccessError: You're not allowed to view the password of an account of this profile

HubBot.LockMainChatInvalidParameter: You need to either supply "on" locking mainchat or "off" unlocking it
HubBot.LockMainChatLocked: You've locked mainchat, as of now only operators and allowed users will be able to speak in mainchat
HubBot.LockMainChatUnLocked: You've unlocked mainchat allowing all users to speak as normal
HubBot.LockMainChatLockedMessage: Mainchat is currently locked, all chatting is disabled
HubBot.LockMainChatUnLockedMessage: Mainchat is now unlocked, everything is back to normal
HubBot.AllowMCProtected: %s hardly needs your permission to talk
HubBot.AllowMCUserIsOperator: %s is an operator and will automatically be allowed to speak
HubBot.AllowMCAlreadyAllow: %s is already allowed to speak in mainchat
HubBot.AllowMCUserAllowed: %s has been allowed to speak in mainchat
HubBot.AllowMCUserMessage: You've been allowed to speak in mainchat even though it's locked
HubBot.AllowMCFeedMessage: %s has been allowed to speak in mainchat by %s
HubBot.DisAllowMCUserIsOperator: %s is an operator thus you're not allowed to disallow him to speak, use mute command instead
HubBot.DisAllowMCNotAllowed: %s isn't allowed to speak in mainchat
HubBot.DisAllowMCDisallowed: %s has been disallowed from speaking in mainchat
HubBot.DisAllowMCUserMessage: You're no longer allowed to speak in mainchat
HubBot.DisAllowMCFeedMessage: %s has been disallowed from speaking in mainchat by %s
HubBot.IPInfoNotAValidIPOrRange: The parameter you've supplied isn't a valid IP/IP pattern
HubBot.HideShareForced: You're forced to hide your share due to profile settings
HubBot.HideShareInvalidParameter: You need to either supply "on" hiding your share or "off" showing it again
HubBot.HideShareEnabled: Your share has now been hidden
HubBot.HideShareDisabled: Your share is now visible again
HubBot.HideShareDisabledNoShare: Your share is now visible again, though you do not share anything
HubBot.HideMeInvalidParameter: You need to either supply "on" hiding yourself (don't show in nicklist) or "off" showing you again
HubBot.HideMeAlreadyHidden: Your already hidden (you'll always see yourself in nicklist)
HubBot.HideMeEnabled: You're now hidden, other users can no longer see you in nicklist
HubBot.HideMeDisabled: You're not hidden anymore, other users can now see you again in nicklist
HubBot.PMProfileProfileDontExists: Profile does not exist, type %s to list profiles
HubBot.PMProfileProfileAccessError: You're not allowed to send messages to users of this profile

HubBot.EnableTextCommandAlreadyDisabled: The text command %s is already disabled

HubBot.BanUserUnBanAble: This user is protected by Lord Yoshi himself, trust me you do NOT wanna do this
HubBot.BanUserTooLowAccountLvl: This user is too powerful for a safe victory
HubBot.BanUserSuccessReason: %s, IP address: %s was banned by %s because: %s
HubBot.BanNickBanned: The nick: %s was banned from the hub
HubBot.BanNickFeedMessageReason: The nick: %s was banned by %s because: %s
HubBot.BanIPIncorrectIP: The IP/IP range you've supplied is invalid
HubBot.BanIPBanned: The IP/IP range: %s was banned from the hub
HubBot.BanIPFeedMessage: The IP/IP range: %s was banned by %s
HubBot.BanIPFeedMessageReason: The IP/IP range: %s was banned by %s because: %s
